description.value: Conformance artifacts for Medication Record, to meet the scope of the Medication Schema
Medication Record - artifacts that are related to the more advanced features and scope of the Medication Record, beyond the Medication Schema
Medication Record / Medication Schema examples and scenarios for validation
Supporting resources used in the examples

name.value: ExampleScenario 1 - Changing brand name in the same VOS

description.value: Prescribed branded medication is changed by another branded medication from the same VOS-cluster

name.value: ExampleScenario 2 - Changing by another medication from a different VOS

description.value: Prescribed medication is changed by another medication from a different VOS-cluster

name.value: ExampleScenario 3 - Dispense medication before the prescription is available

description.value: Dispense of a medication that is made before an existing prescription

name.value: ExampleScenario 4 - Dispense of prescribed medication and of a product without a prescription

description.value: Dispense of two products. One that has a prescription and other that does not (and does not need one).

name.value: ExampleScenario 5 - Dispense of new brand medication because the old is unavailable

description.value: Prescription that is made by brand name and the pharmacist changes the brand name for another brand name in the same VOS - Cluster because there is no stock.

name.value: ExampleScenario 6 - Refusal to dispense the prescribed medication

description.value: Prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist refuses to dispense the medication due to interaction with previous medication.

name.value: ExampleScenario 7 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed to take if needed, but was not taken

description.value: Prescription that is made by VOS and to take only if needed and the pharmacist dispenses it. Then it is reported that the medication was not taken at all.

name.value: ExampleScenario 8 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed, but not taken till the end

description.value: Prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist dispenses it. But at the time of administration, the treatment is stopped due to a reaction.

name.value: ExampleScenario 13 - Dispense of OTC medication for acute symptons

description.value: Dispense of medication OTC and how treatment resources should be handled
